description: API for handling content image claims

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: Token for OAuth user registration is successful

parameters.name: text_url
parameters.description: Chinese language combined similar news images/china/content_image

parameters.name: result_id
parameters.description: The identifier for an API request for error

response_fields.name: result_id
response_fields.description: Identifier for an API request for error

response_fields.name: error
response_fields.description: Calculate error code if any. Empty if no error

response_fields.name: timestamp
response_fields.description: Calculate timestamp if error. Empty if no error

response_fields.name: url
response_fields.description: The URL uploaded to the image server can be used until the proper path return
